import data from "../data/data"; import React from "react"; function ProductView(props) { const selectedProduct = data.productData.find( (i) => i.urun_Id == props.match.params.urun_Id ); return (

{selectedProduct.urun_Ad}



{/* Ürün Kodu: {selectedProduct.code}



Adet Fiyatı: {selectedProduct.lastPrice} TL



İndirimli Adet Fiyatı: {selectedProduct.price} TL
*/}


); } export default ProductView;
